short_summary: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) has a requirement for one (1) Enclosed Trailer.
description: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) has a requirement for one (1) Enclosed Trailer to be delivered to one location in Quebec.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Contract Title: Enclosed Trailer
### Reference Number: cb-6079-68361324

#### Tender Sought: Request for Proposal
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is soliciting proposals from eligible contractors to supply one (1) Enclosed Trailer measuring 8 feet x 16 feet to be delivered to a single location in Westmount, Quebec.

#### Tender Details
* TenderNumber: 202302630
* TenderClosingDate: June 30, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* SolicitationAmendment: Amendment 3
* ExpectedContractStartDate: n/a
* ExpectedContractEndDate: n/a
* UNSPSC: 25181700 (Product and material trailers)

#### Procurement Method
* Competitive and open bidding process
* Selection criteria based on the lowest price

#### Trade Agreements
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Contracting Entity Information
* Name: Royal Canadian Mounted Police
* Address: 4225 Dorchester Blvd, Westmount, QC H3Z 1V5, Canada
* Contact Information:
	+ Name: Jed Ben Aoun
	+ Phone: (438) 945-8112
	+ Email: [Jed.BenAoun@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:Jed.BenAoun@rcmp-grc.gc.ca)

#### Tender Documents
* TenderNotice: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6079/rfp-enclosed-trailer-8-x16--westmount.pdf
* SolicitationAmendment1: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6079/202302630--enclosed-trailer_solicitation_amendment-1.pdf

Please note that the deadline for submission of proposals is June 30, 2023, 2:00 PM EST. Submissions after this deadline will not be accepted.  All tenders must be submitted through the Canada Buys procurement system. 
Feel free to make any adjustments if needed.  Good luck!  .TX Madeline
